column4: The enemy's base camp is located on the river's south bank,\nand the force deployed around it is significant.

column4: The plan, as it stands, is to roll a car loaded down with\nexplosives up to the gate and detonate it.

column4: The second issue is the concrete defensive bunkers that lie\nbeyond the crest of that slope.

column4: The switches' locations are as you see here.

column4: The time has come to take out the Empire's Fouzen \ndefenses, including that armored train.
column5: E' giunto il momento di eliminare le difese Fouzen dell'Impero, compreso quel treno blindato.

column4: The time has finally come to settle things with Maximilian.

column4: The train packs a serious punch from head-on. Keep its\nposition in mind and move your troops safely.

column4: The ultimate objective here is to destroy that giant lance.

column4: The way is open. It's time to enter the citadel and break\nthe enemy's hold upon it.

column4: Their force will advance southward towards the refugee camp.\nYou will all give them a warm reception and some new holes.
column5: Le loro forze avanzeranno verso sud, in direzione del campo profughi. Tutti voi li accoglierete calorosamente e troverete nuovi buchi.

column4: Then you'll have to weather their counteroffensive as you\nmake your way to the summit.
column5: Poi dovrai resistere alla loro controffensiva mentre ti fai strada verso la vetta.

column4: Then, after your advance units occupy the next enemy camp,\nyou can redeploy them there. That'll speed them along.
column5: Poi, dopo che le tue unit= avanzate hanno occupato il prossimo accampamento nemico,\npuoi ridistribuirle li. Questo le render= piu' veloci.

column4: Then, once you've selected a unit you'd like to deploy,\nchoose the position you wish them to take.
column5: Dopo aver selezionato l'unit= che vuoi schierare, scegli la posizione che desideri che assuma.

column4: There are two things to look out for along the way: one is\nthe enemy machine gun emplacements all along the coast.
column5: Ci sono due cose a cui fare attenzione lungo il percorso: una sono le postazioni di mitragliatrici nemiche lungo tutta la costa.

column4: There will be no sight line to targets more than a certain\ndistance away, and you can't spot them in Action Mode.
column5: Non ci sar= alcuna linea di vista verso bersagli che si trovino oltre una certa distanza e non sar= possibile individuarli in Modalit= Azione.

column4: There's a lot of distance to cover out there. I'd recommend\nadding a long-range sniper unit or two.
column5: C'> molta distanza da coprire l= fuori. Consiglierei di\naggiungere una o due unit= di cecchini a lungo raggio.

column4: They can't hit you inside those trenches, but more or less\nthe entire flatland area will be caught in the blast.
column5: Non possono colpirti all'interno di quelle trincee, ma piu' o meno l'intera area pianeggiante verr= colpita dall'esplosione.

column4: They do have a weakness, though. You can do major damage to\nthem by attacking the gun at the front or the rear doors.
column5: Hanno pero' un punto debole. Puoi causare danni ingenti a loro\nattaccando la pistola sulla parte anteriore o posteriore delle porte.

column4: They may be wearing Gallian uniforms, but they're real Feds.\nDon't think twice about pulling those triggers.

column4: They may well have backup stores of ragnite fuel out back.\nIf so, a well-placed gunshot should be able to set it off.
column5: Potrebbero avere delle riserve di carburante di ragnite sul retro. In tal caso, un colpo di pistola ben piazzato dovrebbe essere in grado di farle esplodere.

column4: They will fire at anything that stops in the range depicted.\nKeep your tank and troops clear of them if you want to live.

column4: They'll be bearing down on you with the citadel's cannons,\namong other things. I also advise you to watch for mines.
column5: Ti attaccheranno con i cannoni della cittadella,\ntra le altre cose. Ti consiglio anche di stare attento alle mine.

column4: They'll probably head for the gate and try to destroy it. \nThe tank will be with them.
column5: Probabilmente si dirigeranno verso il cancello e cercheranno di distruggerlo. \nIl carro armato sar= con loro.
